properties.displayName: [Deprecated]: API apps should use an Azure file share for its content directory
properties.description: The content directory of an API app should be located on an Azure file share. To learn more about using Azure Files for hosting app service content refer to https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2151594. We recommend all customers who are still using API Apps to implement the built-in policy called 'App Service apps should use an Azure file shares for its content directory', which is scoped to include API apps in addition to Web Apps.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
